text:
An example given at: http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/content-negotiation.html#about
reads:
"Note that this preference will only be applied when there is a choice of representations and they vary by language."

May I suggest to change this to:
"Note that this preference will migh be applied when there is a choice of representations and they vary by language (see ForceLanguagePriority)."
creator: calestyo@scientia.net
covener@gmail.com
text: This section is about generic content negotiation, not about the knobs available in the implementation.
